title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: An exciting opportunity to work with our frontend team on cutting-edge web applications. You will learn and implement features using React, Tailwind CSS, and modern JavaScript.

title: Backend Developer Intern (PHP/Laravel)
description: Join our backend team to design, develop, and maintain robust APIs using PHP and the Laravel framework. You will gain experience with MySQL, API design, and server management.

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Work alongside our design team to create intuitive and beautiful user interfaces. You will be involved in wireframing, prototyping, and user research.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: A learning opportunity to gain hands-on experience in digital campaigns, social media marketing, and SEO optimization under expert guidance.

title: Data Science Intern
description: You will work with real datasets to build models and gain practical experience in Python, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization tools.

title: Content Writing Intern
description: Create engaging blog posts, social media content, and marketing copy. Improve your writing and SEO knowledge while contributing to real campaigns.

title: Cybersecurity Intern
description: An opportunity to learn about network security, threat analysis, and ethical hacking from professionals in the industry.

title: AI Research Intern
description: Contribute to ongoing research in artificial intelligence, focusing on NLP and computer vision projects. Ideal for candidates with strong academic background.
